sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtstrsmrcvlogsummary ( occrrnc_de , trsmrcv_se_code , provd_instt_id , provd_sys_id , provd_svc_id , requst_instt_id , requst_sys_id , rdcnt , error_co ) VALUES ( #occrrncDe# , #trsmrcvSeCode# , #provdInsttId# , #provdSysId# , #provdSvcId# , #requstInsttId# , #requstSysId# , #rdcnt# , #errorCo# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtstrsmrcvlogsummary SET occrrnc_de = #occrrncDe# , trsmrcv_se_code = #trsmrcvSeCode# , provd_instt_id = #provdInsttId# , provd_sys_id = #provdSysId# , provd_svc_id = #provdSvcId# , requst_instt_id = #requstInsttId# , requst_sys_id = #requstSysId# , rdcnt = #rdcnt# , error_co = #errorCo# WHERE 1 = 1 AND occrrnc_de = #occrrncDe# AND trsmrcv_se_code = #trsmrcvSeCode# AND provd_instt_id = #provdInsttId# AND provd_sys_id = #provdSysId# AND provd_svc_id = #provdSvcId# AND requst_instt_id = #requstInsttId# AND requst_sys_id = #requstSysId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtstrsmrcvlogsummary WHERE 1 = 1 AND occrrnc_de = #occrrncDe# AND trsmrcv_se_code = #trsmrcvSeCode# AND provd_instt_id = #provdInsttId# AND provd_sys_id = #provdSysId# AND provd_svc_id = #provdSvcId# AND requst_instt_id = #requstInsttId# AND requst_sys_id = #requstSysId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT occrrnc_de , trsmrcv_se_code , provd_instt_id , provd_sys_id , provd_svc_id , requst_instt_id , requst_sys_id , rdcnt , error_co FROM COMTSTRSMRCVLOGSUMMARY WHERE occrrnc_de = #occrrncDe# AND trsmrcv_se_code = #trsmrcvSeCode# AND provd_instt_id = #provdInsttId# AND provd_sys_id = #provdSysId# AND provd_svc_id = #provdSvcId# AND requst_instt_id = #requstInsttId# AND requst_sys_id = #requstSysId#

SELECT A.OCCRRNC_DE , A.TRSMRCV_SE_CODE , A.PROVD_INSTT_ID , A.PROVD_SYS_ID , A.PROVD_SVC_ID , A.REQUST_INSTT_ID , A.REQUST_SYS_ID , A.RDCNT , A.ERROR_CO FROM ( SELECT OCCRRNC_DE , TRSMRCV_SE_CODE , PROVD_INSTT_ID , PROVD_SYS_ID , PROVD_SVC_ID , REQUST_INSTT_ID , REQUST_SYS_ID , RDCNT , ERROR_CO , ROWNUM FROM COMTSTRSMRCVLOGSUMMARY WHERE 1=1
OCCRRNC_DE = #searchKeyword#
TRSMRCV_SE_CODE LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY OCCRRNC_DE DESC , TRSMRCV_SE_CODE DESC , PROVD_INSTT_ID DESC , PROVD_SYS_ID DESC , PROVD_SVC_ID DESC , REQUST_INSTT_ID DESC , REQUST_SYS_ID DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTSTRSMRCVLOGSUMMARY WHERE 1=1
OCCRRNC_DE = #searchKeyword#
TRSMRCV_SE_CODE LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
